mapper.insert: insert into rule_publish (rule_publish_id, rule_title, rule_type, user_type_id, region_id, role_id, rule_content, rule_datetime_id, create_time, modify_time, is_alive, is_del, publish_user_id) values (#{rulePublishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ruleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleDatetimeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isAlive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{publishUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update rule_publish
rule_title = #{ruleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_type = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type_id = #{userTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_content = #{ruleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_datetime_id = #{ruleDatetimeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_alive = #{isAlive,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
publish_user_id = #{publishUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rule_publish_id = #{rulePublishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rule_publish set rule_title = #{ruleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_type = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type_id = #{userTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_content = #{ruleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_datetime_id = #{ruleDatetimeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_alive = #{isAlive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, publish_user_id = #{publishUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rule_publish_id = #{rulePublishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT c.rule_publish_id,c.rule_title,c.rule_type,c.user_type_id,c.region_id,c.role_id,c.rule_content,c.rule_datetime_id,c.create_time,c.modify_time,c.is_alive,c.is_del,c.publish_user_id,s.id,s.rule_datetime_id,s.rule_datetime_start,s.rule_datetime_end,s.rule_money,s.order_num,s.rule_num FROM yqdb.rule_publish c LEFT JOIN yqdb.rule_publish_datetime s ON c.rule_datetime_id=s.rule_datetime_id

select c.rule_publish_id,c.rule_title,c.rule_type,c.user_type_id,c.region_id,c.role_id,c.rule_content,c.rule_datetime_id,c.create_time,c.modify_time,c.is_alive,c.is_del,c.publish_user_id,s.id,s.rule_datetime_id,s.rule_datetime_start,s.rule_datetime_end,s.rule_money,s.order_num,s.rule_num from yqdb.rule_publish c,yqdb.rule_publish_datetime s where c.rule_datetime_id=s.rule_datetime_id and c.rule_publish_id=#{rulePublishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select c.rule_publish_id,c.rule_title,c.rule_type,c.user_type_id,c.region_id,c.role_id,c.rule_content,c.rule_datetime_id,c.create_time,c.modify_time,c.is_alive,c.is_del,c.publish_user_id,s.id,s.rule_datetime_id,s.rule_datetime_start,s.rule_datetime_end,s.rule_money,s.order_num,s.rule_num from yqdb.rule_publish c,yqdb.rule_publish_datetime s where c.rule_datetime_id=s.rule_datetime_id and c.publish_user_id=#{publishUserId}

select c.rule_publish_id,c.rule_title,c.rule_type,c.user_type_id,c.region_id,c.role_id,c.rule_content,c.rule_datetime_id,c.create_time,c.modify_time,c.is_alive,c.is_del,c.publish_user_id,s.id,s.rule_datetime_id,s.rule_datetime_start,s.rule_datetime_end,s.rule_money,s.order_num,s.rule_num from yqdb.rule_publish c,yqdb.rule_publish_datetime s where c.rule_datetime_id=s.rule_datetime_id and c.publish_user_id=#{publishUserId} and c.rule_title LIKE '%${ruleTitle}%'
